tuv.seg: Under the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977–2015 circumstances in which unfair dismissal can occur are where:
Faoi na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach 1977-2015 'siad na cúinsí inar féidir le dífhostú éagórach tarlú ná nuair:
• Your employer terminates your contract of employment, with or without notice or
• Cuireann d'fhostóir deireadh le do chonradh fostaíochta, le nó gan fógra nó
• You terminate your contract of employment, with or without notice, due to the conduct of your employer
• Cuireann tú deireadh le do chonradh fostaíochta, le nó gan fógra, toisc iompraíocht d'fhostóir
This is known as constructive dismissal
Dífhostú inchiallaithe a ghlaoitear ar seo
If you are dismissed from your employment, you may, under certain conditions, bring a claim for unfair dismissal against your employer
Má tá tú dífhostaithe ó do chuid fostaíochta, d'fhéadfá, faoi choinníollacha áirithe, éileamh ar dhífhostú éagórach a dhéanamh i gcoinne d'fhostóir
The unfair dismissals legislation does not actually protect you from dismissal, rather it provides a system of appeal whereby you can question the fairness of your dismissal after it has occurred
Ní dhéanann reachtaíocht um dhífhostú éagórach ann féin tú a chosaint ó dhífhostú, ach soláthraítear córas achomhairc inar féidir leat cothroime an dífhostaithe s'agat a cheistiú tar éis dó tarlú
You will have to show that you qualify to bring a claim under the legislation - see 'Rules' below
Beidh ort a léiriú go bhfuil tú incháilithe éileamh a dhéanamh faoin reachtaíocht (féach Rialacha thíos)
If you do this and your employer accepts that there was a dismissal, it will be for your employer to show that there were fair grounds for the dismissal
Má dhéanann tú seo agus go nglacann d'fhostóir go raibh dífhostú ann, beidh dualgas ar an bhfostóir a léiriú go raibh cúiseanna córa don dífhostú
Apart from a case involving constructive dismissal, a dismissal is presumed to be unfair unless your employer can show substantial grounds to justify it
Lasmuigh de chás lena mbaineann dífhostú inchiallaithe, ceaptar go bhfuil dífhostú éagórach murar féidir cúiseanna maithe a thabhairt leis
Under the legislation you may ask your employer for a written statement of the reasons for your dismissal
Faoin reachtaíocht, is féidir leat ráiteas scríofa a iarraidh ar d'fhostóir maidir le cúiseanna an dífhostaithe s'agat
Your employer should provide this within 14 days of your request
Ba chóir don fhostóir s'agat é seo a sholáthar laistigh de 14 lá ó d'iarratas a fháil
If you are found to have been unfairly dismissed you may be placed back in your job or, more commonly, you may receive compensation for the loss of earnings caused by the dismissal
Má fheictear gur dífhostaíodh tú go héagórach, d'fhéadfaí tú a chur ar ais sa phost nó, rud atá níos comónta, d'fhéadfá cúiteamh a fháil ar an gcaillteanas ioncaim de thoradh an dífhostaithe
A dismissal is considered to be automatically unfair if the employee is dismissed for any of the following reasons:
Meastar go bhfuil cúiseanna áirithe do dhífhostú éagórach sa ghnáthchúrsa. Ina measc:
• Membership or proposed membership of a trade union or engaging in trade union activities, whether within permitted times during work or outside of working hours
• Ballraíocht ag an bhfostaí, nó tá ballraíocht a bheith ar intinn aige/aici, de cheardchumann nó gníomhaíocht in imeachtaí ceardchumainn,
• Religious or political opinions
• Tuairimí creidimh nó polaitiúla
• Legal proceedings against an employer where an employee is a party or a witness
• Imeachtaí dlíthiúla in aghaidh fostóra nuair atá an fostaí mar pháirtí nó finné
• Race, colour, sexual orientation, age or membership of the Traveller community
• Cine, dath, claonadh gnéis,aois nó duine den Lucht Siúil
• Pregnancy, giving birth or breastfeeding or any matters connected with pregnancy or birth
• Toircheas, saolú linbh nó tabhairt chun cíche nó aon rud a bhaineann le toircheas nó breith
• Availing of rights under legislation to maternity leave, adoptive leave, paternity leave, carer's leave, parental or force majeure leave
• saoire altramais, saoire atharthachta, saoire cúramóra, saoire thuismitheora nó saoire force majeure
• Making a protected disclosure under the Protected Disclosures Act 2014
• Ag déanamh nochtadh cosanta faoin Acht um Nochtadh Cosanta 2014
Under the unfair dismissals legislation, redundancy is considered to be a fair ground for dismissal
Faoin reachtaíocht um dhífhostú éagórach ceaptar gur cúis maith le dífhostú í iomarcaíocht
However although a redundancy situation exists, you may have grounds for complaint if the manner of your selection for redundancy was unfair
Cé go bhfuil iomarcaíocht i gceist, seans go mbeidh de cheart agat gearán a dhéanamh má roghnaíodh thú go héagórach

You may qualify to bring a claim for unfair dismissal if you consider that you were unfairly selected for redundancy or consider that a genuine redundancy situation did not exist – see ‘How to apply’ below
Dá gceapann tú go mbeadh tú dífhostaithe éagórach d'fhéadfá bheith incháilithe chun éileamh ar dhífhostú éagórach a dhéanamh
Unless your employer can prove there was a genuine redundancy situation and that fair procedures were followed, your dismissal may be found to be unfair
Ceaptar go bhfuil dífhostú éagórach murar féidir le d’fhostóir cúis iomarcaíochta dhílis agus nósanna imeachta maithe a thabhairt leis
If you make a claim for unfair dismissal, you cannot also claim redundancy
Má chuireann tú isteach ar chúiteamh le haghaidh dífhostaithe éagóraigh ní féidir cuir isteach le haghaidh iomarcaíochta
In order to qualify to bring a claim for unfair dismissal under the legislation the following requirements must be met:
Ionas go gcáileofaí éileamh a dhéanamh ar dhífhostú éagórach faoin reachtaíocht caithfear na riachtanais a leanas a bhaint amach:
The time limit for beginning a claim for unfair dismissal is 6 months from the date of the dismissal
'Sí an teorainn ama chun éileamh a thosú ar dhífhostú éagórach ná sé mhí ó dháta an dífhostaithe
If there is reasonable cause you may be allowed to extend this period up to 12 months from the date of dismissal
Má tá cúinsí réasúnacha, d'fhéadfaí go mbeadh cead agat an tréimhse seo a leathnú go 12 mí ó dháta an dífhostaithe
However, this must be reasonable cause - saying you did not know the law will not suffice
Cibé ar bith, is gá gur cúinsí réasúnacha a bheadh i gceist - ní leor a rá nach raibh an dlí ar eolas agat
The date of dismissal, under the unfair dismissals legislation, is the date on which the notice to which you are entitled expires
Is é dáta an dífhostaithe, faoin reachtaíocht um dhífhostú éagórach, an dáta deiridh den fhógra a bhfuil tú i dteideal
You are entitled to a statutory minimum period of notice if you have worked at least 13 weeks for your employer
Tá tú i dteideal íostréimhse fógra reachtúil má tá tú tar éis oibriú ar feadh 13 seachtainí ar a laghad don fhostóir s'agat
Your written contract of employment may provide for a longer period of notice
D'fhéadfadh do chonradh scríofa fostaíochta soláthar a dhéanamh do thréimhse fógra níos faide
Normally you must have at least 12 months' continuous service with your employer in order to bring a claim for unfair dismissal
Go hiondúil, caithfidh tú ar a laghad 12 mí de sheirbhís leanúnach le d'fhostóir a bheith agat chun éileamh a dhéanamh ar dhífhostú éagórach
However there are important exceptions to this general rule
Cibé ar bith tá eisceachtaí tábhachtacha leis an riail ghinearálta seo
If you have less than 12 months' continuous service you may bring a claim for unfair dismissal if you are dismissed for:
Má tá níos lú ná 12 mí de sheirbhís leanúnach agat d'fhéadfá éileamh maidir le dhífhostú éagórach a dhéanamh má dhífhostaítear tú toisc:
• Trade union membership or activity
• Ballraíocht nó gníomhaíocht i gceardchumann
• Pregnancy, giving birth or breastfeeding or any matters connected with pregnancy or birth
• Toircheas, breith linbh nó beathú cíche nó ceisteanna ar bith a bhaineann le toircheas nó breith

• Availing of rights granted by the Maternity Protection Acts 1994 and 2004, the Adoptive Leave Acts 1995 and 2005, the Paternity Leave and Benefit Act 2016 the National Minimum Wage Act 2000, the Parental Leave Acts 1998 and 2006 and the Carer's Leave Act 2001

• Ag baint leasa as na cearta deonaithe ag na hAchtanna um Chosaint Mháithreachais 1994 agus 2004, na hAchtanna um Shaoire Uchtaíoch 1995 agus 2005, an tAcht um Shaoire agus Sochar Atharthachta 2016, an tAcht um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta 2000, an tAcht um Shaoire Tuismitheora 1998 agus 2006 agus an tAcht um Saoire Cúramóra 2001
• Making a protected disclosure under the Protected Disclosures Act 2014
• Ag déanamh nochtadh cosanta faoin Acht um Nochtadh Cosanta 2014

Note: employment equality legislation prohibits dismissal based on any of the following 9 grounds for discrimination: gender, civil status, family status, age, disability, religious belief, race, sexual orientation or membership of the Traveller community

Nóta: faoin reachtaíocht comhionannais fostaíocht a ní féidir le fostóir aon duine a roghnú ar son dífhostaithe ar aon cheann den naoi gcúis leatroma seo a leanas: gnéas, stádas sibhialta, stádas teaghlaigh, aois, míchumas, creideamh, cine, claonadh gnéis nó duine den Lucht Siúil

So, for example, if you have been employed for less than a year you may not be able to bring a claim under the unfair dismissals legislation, but you may be able make a complaint of discriminatory dismissal - see 'How to apply' below

Mar sin, cuir i gcás go raibh tú fostaithe ar feadh níos lú ná bliain, d'fhéadfadh nach mbeifeá a bheith in ann éileamh a dhéanamh faoin reachtaíocht dífhostaithe éagóracha , ach d'fhéadfá é a dhéanamh faoi reachtaíocht comhionannais - féach 'Conas iarratas a dhéanamh' thíos
In general, the continuity of an employee's employment is only broken by the dismissal of the employee by the employer or the termination of the employment by the employee
Go ginearálta, ní bhristear leanúnachas fostaíochta an fhostaí ach amháin trí dhífhostú an fhostaí ón bhfostóir nó foirceannadh na fostaíochta ón bhfostaí
You must be an employee, working under a contract of service
Caithfidh tú a bheith i d'fhostaí, ag obair faoi chonradh seirbhíse

The essential element of such a contract is that the relationship is one of employer/employee, as opposed to a contract for services where the relationship involves performing a service in return for payment, that is, a contractor

'Sí an eilimint is riachtanaí de chonradh mar seo ná gur caidreamh fostóir/fostaí atá i gceist, seachas conradh do sheirbhísí nuair a bhaineann an caidreamh le seirbhís a chomhlíonadh ar íocaíocht , i.e
In the case of agency employees, for the purpose of redress under the Acts, the employer is the person or organisation for whom the employee is actually working
conraitheoir. I gcás iad siúd atá oibrithe gníomhaireachta, 'siad an fostóir iarbhír an fostóir ar chuspóirí sásaimh faoi na hAchtanna
You must have been dismissed in order to bring a claim
Caithfidh gur dífhostaíodh tú ionas gur féidir leat éileamh a dhéanamh
The one exception to this is the concept of constructive dismissal where you resign but claim that your employer's conduct towards you forced your resignation

An taon eisceacht amháin dó seo ná coincheap an dífhostaithe inchiallaithe nuair a éiríonn tú as, ach go ndéanann tú éileamh go raibh iompraíocht d'fhostóir i do threo ar an gcúis gur cuireadh brú ort éirí as
If your employer disputes that a dismissal actually took place, you will have to establish that it did
Má shéanann d'fhostóir gur tharla dífhostú i bhfírinne, beidh ort a bhunú gur tharla
Only then will your claim continue to the next stage of deciding whether the dismissal was fair, which is a matter for your employer to prove

Ní leanfaidh d'éileamh ar aghaidh go dtí an chéad staid eile maidir le cinneadh a dhéanamh an raibh an dífhostú cothrom nó nach raibh go dtí go ndeimhnítear an méid seo, agus caithfidh d'fhostóir an cheist seo a chruthú
The Acts do not apply to the following:
Ní bhaineann na hAchtanna leis na daoine a leanas:
(a) an employee who is under 16, or who has reached normal retiring age or who is not covered by the Redundancy Payments Acts because of age
(a) fostaí atá faoi 16, nó atá tar éis an gnáthaois scoir a shroicheadh nó nach bhfuil clúdaithe faoi na hAchtanna um Íocaíochtaí Iomarcaíochta toisc cúinsí aoise
(b) a person working for a close relative in a private house or farm, provided both also live in the same house or farm;
(b) duine atá ag obair do dhuine gaolta i dteach príobháideach nó feirm, chomh fada agus go gcónaíonn an bheirt sa teach nó feirm céanna chomh maith;
(c) a member of the Defence Forces
(c) ball d'Óglaigh na hÉireann
(d) a member of the Garda Síochána (since 4 July 2006, the Acts apply to most State employees)
(d) ball den Gharda Síochána (ó 4 Iúil 2006 bhaineann na hActanna leis an cuid is mó do fostaí Stáit)
(e) a person undergoing full-time training or apprenticeship
(e) duine atá i mbun oiliúna lánaimseartha nó printíseacht le FÁS
(f) an officer of education and training boards, a county or city manager and the chief executive of the Health Service Executive
(f) oifigeach de chuid na mboird oideachais agus oiliúna, bainisteoir contae nó cathrach, agus an príomhfheidhmeannach don Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte

(g) an employee who is employed under a fixed-term/specified-purpose contract and where the contract is in writing, is signed by both parties and contains a clause that the Acts shall not apply in relation to a dismissal consisting only of the expiration of the fixed term contract or the completion of the specified purpose

(g) fostaí atá fostaithe faoi chonradh ar théarma seasta/cuspóir-shonraithe agus nuair atá an conradh i scríbhinn, sínithe ag an dá phairtí agus a chuimsíonn foráil nach mbainfidh na hAchtanna maidir le dífhostú, a chuimsíonn dáta éagtha an chonartha ar théarma seasta nó comhlánú an chuspóir-shonraithe
You can find out detailed information about fixed-term/specified-purpose contracts and dismissal in 'Further information' below
Léigh 'Tuilleadh eolais' thíos faoi chonarthaí ar théarma seasta/cuspóir-shonraithe agus dífhostú

(h) an employee who works outside the State (unless the employee is resident in the State for the duration of the contract or is domiciled in the State and the employer is resident in the State for the duration of the contract)

(h) fostaí a oibríonn lasmuigh den Stát (murach go bhfuil an fostaí cónaitheach sa Stát le linn tréimhse an chonartha nó gnáthchónaí air/uirthi sa Stát agus go bhfuil an fostóir cónaitheach sa Stát le linn tréimhse an chonartha)
(i) statutory apprentices who are dismissed within 6 months after beginning apprenticeship or within one month after the completion of the apprenticeship
(i) printíseachtaí reachtúla atá dífhostaithe laistigh de sé mhí tar éis printíseacht a thosú nó laistigh de mhí ó chomhlánú na printíseachta

(j) an employee who is on probation or undergoing training at the beginning of employment, provided that the duration of probation or training is one year or less and is specified in the written contract of employment
(j) fostaí atá ar promhadh nó i mbun oiliúna ag tús fostaíochta, chomh fada agus go bhfuil tréimhse an phromhaidh nó na hoiliúna bliain amháin nó níos lú agus sonraithe i gconradh scríofa fostaíochta
(k) an employee who is dismissed during training for qualification or registration as a nurse or for other specified para-medical employment
(k) fostaí atá dífhostaithe le linn oiliúna do cháilíocht nó do chlárú mar altra nó d'fhostaíocht sonraithe eile paraimhíochaine
Note: The exclusions from the Acts of persons referred to in points (b), (e), (i), (j) and (k) shall not apply where the dismissal results from:
Nóta: Ní bhaineann na heisiaimh ó na hAchtanna le daoine a thagraítear dóibh sna pointí (b), (e), (i), (j) agus (k) nuair a tharlaíonn dífhostaithe de bharr:
• The employee's pregnancy, giving birth or breastfeeding
• Toircheas an fhostaí, breith linbh nó beathú cíche
• Availing of rights under the Maternity Protection Acts 1994 and 2004
• Ag baint leasa as na cearta faoi na hAchtanna um Chosaint Mháithreachais 1994 agus 2004
• Availing of rights to adoptive leave or additional adoptive leave, paternity leave, parental leave, force majeure leave or carer's leave
• Ag baint leasa as do chearta do shaoire uchtaíoch nó saoire uchtaíoch bhreise, saoire atharthachta, saoire thuismitheora, saoire force majeure nó saoire cúramóra

The exclusion from the Acts of persons referred to in points (a) and (d) shall not apply where the dismissal results from the employee availing of the right to parental leave, force majeure leave or carer's leave

Ní bhainfidh an eisiamh ó na hAchtanna le daoine a thagraítear dóibh i bpointí (a) agus (d) nuair atá an dífhostú de thoradh ar fhostaí ag baint leasa as an gceart do shaoire tuismitheora, saoire force majeure nó saoire cúramóra
The exclusion from the Acts of persons referred to in points (d) and (e) shall not apply where the dismissal results from the employee making a protected disclosure
Ní bhainfidh an t-eisiamh ó na hAchtanna le daoine a thagraítear dóibh i bpointí (d) agus (e) nuair atá an dífhostú de thoradh ar fhostaí ag déanamh nochtadh cosanta

The Unfair Dismissals Acts will not apply to a dismissal where the employee's employer at the commencement of the employment informs the employee in writing that the employment will terminate on the return to work with that employer of another employee who is absent from work while on maternity leave, adoptive leave, paternity leave or carer's leave

Ní bhainfidh na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach le dífhostú nuair a insíonn fostóir an fhostaí don fhostaí i scríbhinn ag tús na fostaíochta go mbeidh deireadh leis an bhfostaíocht ar fhilleadh chun na hoibre leis an bhfostóir sin d'fhostaí eile atá as láthair nuair atá siad ar shaoire mháithreachais, saoire uchtaíoch, saoire atharthachta nó saoire cúramóra
If you are successful in your claim for unfair dismissal, the body that heard your claim may award you one of the following remedies:
Má tá rath ar an éileamh s'agat ar dhífhostú éagórach, d'fhéadfadh an foras a d'éist le d'éileamh ceann de na leigheasanna a leanas a bhronnadh ort:
This means that you are treated as if you had never been dismissed
Ciallaíonn sé seo go ndéileáiltear leat amhail is nár dífhostaíodh tú riamh

Not only are you entitled to loss of earnings from the date of the dismissal to the date of the hearing, you are also entitled to any favourable changes in the terms of employment during that period, for example, pay rises

Ní hamháin go bhfuil tú i dteideal do chaillteanas ioncaim ó dháta na dífhostaithe go dtí dáta na héisteachta, tá tú i dteideal chomh maith d'aon athruithe fabharacha le linn an tréimhse sin, mar shampla, arduithe pá
This remedy is rarely used
Is annamh a úsáidtear an leigheas seo
This means that you will be given your job back but only from a particular date, for example, the date of the decision in your favour
Ciallaíonn sé seo go dtabharfar do phost ar ais duit ach díreach ó dháta áirithe, mar shampla, dáta an chinnidh i d'fhabhar
This means that you will not be entitled to compensation for any loss of earnings
Ciallaíonn sé seo nach mbeidh tú i dteideal do chúiteamh ar aon chaillteanas ioncaim
Often this remedy is used where it is felt that the employee contributed to the dismissal, even though the actual dismissal was unfair
Úsáidtear an leigheas seo go minic nuair a airítear gur chuir an fostaí leis an dífhostú, cé go raibh an dífhostú ann féin éagórach
Again, however, this remedy is rarely used
Arís, cibé ar bith, is annamh a úsáidtear an réiteach seo
This is the most common remedy
Seo é an leigheas is comónta
It is essential to note that compensation is only awarded in respect of financial loss
Tá sé riachtanach a nótáil nach mbronntar cúiteamh ach amháin maidir le caillteanas airgid
Generally, the maximum compensation is 2 years’ pay
De ghnáth, is an uaschúiteamh é 2 bhliain phá
If you were dismissed for making a protected disclosure, the maximum is 5 years’ pay
Má tá tú dífhostaithe mar gheall ar nochtadh cosanta, is an uaschúiteamh é 5 bhliain phá
You cannot claim any compensation for such matters as injury to your feelings or stress caused by the dismissal
Ní féidir leat dá réir éileamh a dhéanamh ar chúiteamh do cheisteanna díobhála do na mothúcháin s'agat nó strus ag eascairt ón dífhostú
Compensation will take the following matters into account:
Tógfaidh cúiteamh na ceisteanna a leanas san áireamh:
• Present loss - a calculation of your loss of earnings from the date of the dismissal to the hearing of your claim
• Caillteanas láithreach - ríomh ar do chaillteanas ioncaim ó dháta na dífhostaithe go dtí an dáta a éistítear le d'éileamh
Any money earned by you during this period will be deducted, as will any payment in lieu of notice received by you when you were dismissed
Déanfar aon airgead atá tuillte agat le linn an tréimhse seo a asbhaint, mar a bheidh aon íocaíocht d'fhógra a d'aimsigh tú nuair a dífhostaíodh tú
You are also obliged to lessen your losses during the period from your dismissal to the hearing by being available for and seeking alternative employment
Tá dualgas ort do chuid caillteanais a mhaolú le linn an tréimhse ó do dhífhostú go dtí an éisteacht trí 'bheith ar fáil agus a bheith ag cuardach fostaíochta malartach
If it transpires that you have no actual loss, because, for example, you took up other employment immediately after your dismissal, you are entitled to a token compensation of 4 weeks' pay

Má tharlaíonn sé nár bhain aon chaillteanas ann féin duit, toisc, mar shampla, gur thóg tú fostaíocht suas díreach tar éis an dífhostaithe s'agat, tá tú i dteideal do chúiteamh comharthach de phá ceithre seachtainí
• Future loss - a calculation will be made as to your future loss, based on a consideration of how long it is likely to be before you can get alternative work
• Caillteanas todhchaíoch - déanfar ríomh maidir le do chaillteanas todhchaíoch, bunaithe ar cé chomh fada agus a cheaptar a bheidh sé roimh a thagann tú ar obair mhalartach
• Pension loss - a calculation that will try to assess what impact the unfair dismissal has had on your pension entitlements
• Caillteanas pinsean - ríomh a dhéanfaidh iarracht measúnú a dhéanamh ar éifeacht an dífhostaithe éagorach ar do theidlíochtaí pinsean
• Loss of statutory protection - a calculation dealing with the point that you will have lost protection under the unfair dismissals, redundancy and minimum notice legislation
• Caillteanas ar chosaint reachtúil - ríomh ag déileáil leis an bpointe go mbeidh cosaint caillte agat faoi dhífhostaithe éagóracha, iomarcaíocht agus reachtaíocht an fhógra íostréimhse
• Contributory conduct - a calculation that will take into account any conduct by you that contributed to the dismissal, even though it was an unfair dismissal
• Iompraíocht ranníocach - ríomh a thógfaidh san áireamh aon iompraíocht uait a chuir leis an dífhostú, cé gur dífhostú éagórach a bhí i gceist
The degree of contribution will be stated in percentage terms and your award overall award reduced accordingly
Sonrófar méid na héifeachta seo i dtéarmaí céatadáin agus laghdófar an bronnadh iomlán ort dá réir
If you wish to make a claim for unfair dismissal you should do so within 6 months of the date of dismissal
Más mian leat éileamh a dhéanamh ar dhífhostú éagórach ba chóir duit é seo a dhéanamh laistigh de 6 mhí ó dháta an dífhostaithe
This time limit may be extended to 12 months if there was "reasonable cause" for the delay
D'fhéadfaí an teorainn ama seo a leathnú go 12 mí i gcásanna nuair a chuir cúinsí réasúnacha cosc ar an éileamh a bheith déanta laistigh de 6 mhí
You should make your complaint to the Workplace Relations Commission using the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie
Caithfidh tú d'éileamh a dhéanamh leis an gCoimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre tríd an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne a úsáid á fáil ar workplacerelations.ie
Complaints will be referred to an adjudication officer for hearing

Fixed-term or specified-purpose contracts and dismissal
Breis faisnéise: Conarthaí ar théarma seasta nó cuspóir-shonraithe agus dífhostú
A fixed-term contract is a contract of a specific length where the duration of the contract is known to both parties from the outset
Is conradh d'fhad ar leith é conradh ar théarma seasta nuair atá tréimhse an chonartha ar eolas ag an dá pháirtí ón tús
A specified-purpose contract is also of a limited duration, but the parties do not know the length of the contract from the outset
Tá tréimhse theoranta ag baint le conradh cuspóir-shonraithe chomh maith, ach nach bhfuil fad an chonartha ar eolas ag an dá pháirtí ón tús
It will be envisaged that it is of limited duration to end when the specified purpose of the contract is completed
Feictear go mbeidh sé teoranta ó thaobh ama agus go gcríochnóidh sé nuair a bheidh cuspóir shonraithe an chonartha comhlánaithe

When an employee is dismissed at the end of a fixed-term or specified-purpose contract the unfair dismissals legislation applies as normal unless the employer has availed of the provision to exclude the operation of the legislation

Nuair a dhífhostaítear fostaí ag deireadh conartha ar théarma seasta nó cuspóir-shonraithe, baineann an reachtaíocht um dhífhostú éagórach mar is gnách murar bhain an fostóir leas as an bhforáil oibriú na reachtaíochta a eisiamh
The 3 conditions to be met in order to bring this exclusion into play are:
Is iad na trí coinníollacha a gcaithfear cloí leo ionas gur féidir an t-eisiamh seo a chur i bhfeidhm ná:
• The contract must be in writing and must set out the specific duration of the fixed-term contract or, in the case of a specified-purpose contract, the object of the contract

• Caithfidh an conradh a bheith i scríbhinn agus caithfear tréimhse shonrach an chonartha ar théarma seasta a leagan amach nó, i gcás an chonartha chuspóir-shonraithe, cuspóir an chonartha a leagan amach
• The contract must be signed by both the employee and the employer
• Caithfidh an fostaí agus an fostóir araon an conradh a shíniú
• The contract must contain a specific clause stating that the Unfair Dismissals Acts will not apply to the expiry of the term of the contract
• Caithfidh an conradh foráil shonrach a chuimsiú ag rá nach mbaineann na hActanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach le héag théarma an chonartha

If these conditions are not met then you may have a claim for unfair dismissal despite the fact that you are employed under a fixed-term or specified-purpose contract, subject to fulfilling the normal requirements as to length of service, etc

Mura gcloítear leis na coinníollacha seo, b'fhéidir go bhféadfá éileamh a dhéanamh ar dhífhostú éagórach cé go bhfuil tú fostaithe faoi chonradh ar théarma seasta nó cuspóir-shonraithe, ag brath ar ghnáthriachtanais maidir le fad seirbhíse, etc. a chomhlíonadh

Under the Protection Of Employees (Fixed-Term Work) Act 2003 (pdf), if an employee is required to enter into a number of such fixed-term or specified-purpose contracts there are two possible situations as follows:

Faoin Acht um Chosaint Fostaithe (Obair ar Théarma Seasta) 2003 (pdf), má tá riachtanas ar fhostaí iontráil isteach i líon áirithe de chonarthaí ar théarma seasta nó cuspóir-shonraithe, tá dhá chás fhéideartha mar a leanas:

• Employees on fixed-term contracts which commenced prior to the passing of the Act: Once such an employee completes or has completed 3 years' continuous employment (any or all of the 3 years' service may have occurred prior to the passing of the Act) the employer may renew the contract for a fixed term on one occasion only and that renewal may be for a period of no longer than one year

• Fostaithe ar chonarthaí ar théarmaí seasta a thosaigh roimh inachtú an Achta: Chomh luath agus atá trí bliana de sheirbhís leanúnach fostaíochta comhlánaithe ag fostaí mar seo (d'fhéadfadh aon chuid nó an chuid ar fad den tseirbhís trí bliana tarlú roimh inachtú an Achta) is féidir leis an bhfostóir an conradh a athnuachan do théarma seasta babhta amháin agus ní féidir leis an tréimhse a bheith níos faide ná bliain amháin

• Employees on a fixed-term employment contract which commenced after the passing of the Act: Where such an employee is employed by his or her employer or associated employer on two or more continuous fixed-term contracts, the aggregate duration of those contracts may not exceed 4 years

• Fostaithe ar chonarthaí ar théarmaí seasta a thosaigh tar éis inachtú an Achta: Nuair atá fostaí mar seo fostaithe ag a f(h)ostóir nó fostóir gaolmhar ar dhá cheann nó níos mó de chonarthaí leanúnacha ar théarma seasta, ní féidir leis an tréimhse chomhiomlán a bhaineann leis na conarthaí sin a bheidh níos faide ná ceithre bliana
However, the above-mentioned rules do not apply where there are objective grounds justifying the renewal of a contract of employment for a fixed term only
Ní bhaineann na rialacha thuas, áfach, nuair atá cúiseanna oibiachtúla a thugann údar le hathnuachan an chonartha fostaíochta ar théarma seasta amháin
Where a renewal of a fixed-term contract does not comply with the above requirements and cannot be objectively justified, the contract is treated as an open-ended contract
Nuair nach gcloíonn athnuachan conartha ar théarma seasta leis na riachtanais thuas agus nach bhfuil údar oibiachtúil leis, déileáiltear leis an gconradh mar chonradh oscailte
The Unfair Dismissal Acts contain a provision aimed at ensuring that successive temporary contracts are not used in order to avoid that legislation
Cuimsíonn na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach foráil a bhfuil sé mar aidhm aici a chinntiú nach n-úsáidtear conarthaí leanúnacha sealadacha chun an reachtaíocht sin a sheachaint
Where a fixed-term or specified-purpose contract expires and the individual is re-employed within 3 months, the individual is deemed to have continuous service
Nuair a éagann conradh ar théarma seasta nó cuspóir-shonraithe agus athfhostaítear an duine laistigh de thrí mhí, meastar go bhfuil seirbhís leanúnach ag an duine sin

Therefore, even where an employer excludes the unfair dismissals legislation in the manner described above, an adjudicator will consider whether the use of such contracts was wholly or partly to avoid the employee having the protection of the unfair dismissals legislation

Dá réir sin, fiú amháin má dhéanann an fostóir an reachtaíocht um dhífhostú éagórach a eisiamh mar atá cur síos air thuas, déanfaidh breithneoir a mheas ar úsáideadh conarthaí mar seo go hiomlán nó de chuid chun cosaint an fhostaí a sheachaint mar a bhaineann sí le reachtaíocht um dhífhostú éagórach

If it is considered that this was the case and the contracts were not separated by more than 3 months and the job was at least similar, then the case can be dealt with as if there was continuous employment and the employer will be required to justify the dismissal in the normal manner

Má mheastar gurbh amhlaidh a bhí agus nár scaradh na conarthaí de thréimhsí níos mó na trí mhí agus go raibh na poist cosúil lena chéile ar a laghad, is féidir déileáil leis an gcás amhail is go raibh fostaíocht leanúnach i gceist, agus beidh ar an bhfostóir údar an dífhostaithe a mhíniú mar is gnách
